domain.name: Politician
domain.description: Politicians in the world, like Joe Biden

text:
@Jim_Jordan What's more important:

-Trying not to die from coronavirus or trying not to die from police brutality?
-Taking action when you see injustice and trying to effect change or minimizing your exposure?

The choice to protest during these times is nuanced and not simple.
